00026 #include "OgrePagingLandScapePrecompiledHeaders.h"
00027 
00028 #include "OgreDebugRectangle2D.h"
00029 #ifdef _VISIBILITYDEBUG
00030 
00031 #include "OgreHardwareBufferManager.h"
00032 #include "OgreCamera.h"
00033 
00034 #include "OgreRoot.h"
00035 
00036 namespace Ogre {
00037 #define POSITION_BINDING 0
00038 
00039     DebugRectangle2D::DebugRectangle2D() : SimpleRenderable ()
00040     {
00041         mRenderOp.indexData = new IndexData();
00042         mRenderOp.vertexData = new VertexData();
00043         mRenderOp.operationType = RenderOperation::OT_LINE_LIST; 
00044         mRenderOp.indexData->indexCount = 8;
00045         mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexCount = 4;
00046         mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexStart = 0; 
00047         mRenderOp.useIndexes = true; 
00048 
00049 
00050         VertexDeclaration* decl = mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexDeclaration;
00051         VertexBufferBinding* bind = mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexBufferBinding;
00052 
00053         decl->addElement(POSITION_BINDING, 0, VET_FLOAT3, VES_POSITION);
00054         const size_t offset = VertexElement::getTypeSize(VET_FLOAT3);    
00055         decl->addElement (POSITION_BINDING, offset, VET_COLOUR, VES_DIFFUSE);
00056         
00057 
00058         mRenderOp.indexData->indexBuffer = HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton().createIndexBuffer(
00059                             HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_16BIT,
00060                             mRenderOp.indexData->indexCount, 
00061                             HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
00062 
00063         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf = 
00064             HardwareBufferManager::getSingleton().createVertexBuffer(
00065             decl->getVertexSize(POSITION_BINDING),
00066             mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexCount,
00067             HardwareBuffer::HBU_STATIC_WRITE_ONLY);
00068 
00069         // Bind buffer
00070         bind->setBinding(POSITION_BINDING, vbuf);
00071 
00072         SimpleRenderable::setBoundingBox(AxisAlignedBox(-1000 * Vector3::UNIT_SCALE, 
00073                                             1000 * Vector3::UNIT_SCALE));
00074 
00075         SimpleRenderable::setRenderQueueGroup (RENDER_QUEUE_OVERLAY); 
00076         
00077         // set basic white material
00078         SimpleRenderable::setMaterial("BaseWhiteNoLighting");
00079     }
00080 
00081     DebugRectangle2D::~DebugRectangle2D() 
00082     {
00083         delete mRenderOp.vertexData;
00084         delete mRenderOp.indexData;
00085     }
00086 
00087     void DebugRectangle2D::setCorners(Real left, Real top, Real right, Real bottom) 
00088     {
00089         VertexDeclaration * const decl = mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexDeclaration;
00090         const VertexElement* poselem = decl->findElementBySemantic(VES_POSITION);
00091         const VertexElement* colorelem = decl->findElementBySemantic(VES_DIFFUSE);
00092 
00093         
00094         HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vbuf = 
00095             mRenderOp.vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(POSITION_BINDING);
00096        
00097         
00098         const size_t vertexSize = vbuf->getVertexSize ();
00099         float *pPos;
00100         RGBA *pColor;
00101         Root * const root = Root::getSingletonPtr();
00102 
00103         uchar* pMain = static_cast<uchar *>(
00104             vbuf->lock(HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00105 
00106 
00107 //    #define V3(AX, AY, AZ, ACOLOR) poselem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMain, &pPos); \
00108 //            *pPos++ = AX; *pPos++ =  AY; *pPos++ =  AZ; \
00109 //            pMain += vertexSize;
00110 
00111 #define V3(A_X, A_Y, A_Z, ACOLOR) poselem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMain, &pPos); \
00112                         *pPos++ = static_cast <float> (A_X); \
00113                         *pPos++ = static_cast <float> (A_Y); \
00114                         *pPos++ = static_cast <float> (A_Z); \
00115             colorelem->baseVertexPointerToElement(pMain, &pColor); \
00116             root->convertColourValue (ACOLOR, pColor); \
00117             pMain += vertexSize;
00118 
00119         V3(left, top, -1.0f, ColourValue::White)
00120         V3(left, bottom, -1.0f, ColourValue::White)
00121         V3(right, bottom, -1.0f, ColourValue::White)
00122         V3(right, top, -1.0f, ColourValue::White)
00123 
00124         vbuf->unlock();
00125 
00126         
00127                 
00128         HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuf = mRenderOp.indexData->indexBuffer;     
00129         ushort* pIdx = static_cast<ushort*>(
00130             iBuf->lock(0, iBuf->getSizeInBytes(),HardwareBuffer::HBL_DISCARD));
00131 
00132        
00133         *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (0); *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (1); // line 1
00134         *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (1); *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (2); // line 2
00135         *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (2); *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (3); // line 3
00136         *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (3); *pIdx++ = static_cast<ushort> (0); // line 4
00137 
00138         iBuf->unlock();
00139     }

00141     // Override this method to prevent parent transforms (rotation,translation,scale)
00142     void DebugRectangle2D::getWorldTransforms(Matrix4* xform) const
00143     {
00144         // return identity matrix to prevent parent transforms
00145         *xform = Matrix4::IDENTITY;
00146     }
00147     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00148     const Quaternion& DebugRectangle2D::getWorldOrientation(void) const
00149     {
00150         return Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00151     }
00152     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00153     const Vector3& DebugRectangle2D::getWorldPosition(void) const
00154     {
00155         return Vector3::ZERO;
00156     }
